title: The One About Interracial Dating
description:
This week Bob and Monét are talking all things interracial dating! Pixie Ventura calls in to test how well Bob and Monét know their Spanish, Bob describes his Doppelbänger past, and they dive into their take on the phenomenon of black celebrities only dating white people. Listen in as Bob and Monét open up about the pressures to date black people, the struggles of dating as a Drag Queen, and so much more!
DON’T MISS THE SEASON PREMIERE OF RUPAUL’S DRAG RACE. FRIDAY, JANUARY 7TH AT 8/7 CENTRAL ONLY ON VH1.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
